se3projecta - package se3projecta
This package contains classes used throughout the Application.
SE3ProjectA - Class in se3projecta
Main class that runs the Application.

se3projecta.GUI - package se3projecta.GUI
This package contains classes used in the Graphical User Interface of this application.
se3projecta.Model - package se3projecta.Model
This package contains classes that control the functionality of the Application.
se3projecta.Persistence - package se3projecta.Persistence
This package contains classes which allow persistent storage of Application data in an XML format.
Seat - Class in se3projecta.Model
Allows individual seats to be booked as part of a TheatreSession.

SeatButton - Class in se3projecta.GUI
JButton which wraps a Seat object and can be clicked to book or un-book.

Create SeatButton.
SeatState - Enum in se3projecta.Model
SeatState defines whether a Seat is Empty (not booked or allocated), Held (allocated but not booked), or Occupied (Booked).
SeatType - Class in se3projecta.Model
Allows different types of seats to be booked for different prices.
SeatType() - Constructor for class se3projecta.Model.SeatType
 
SessionTime - Class in se3projecta.Model
